name: @tkottke90/sequelize-migration-builder
description: Sequelize helper tool to generate migrations

scripts.release: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:changelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && npm run release:changelog && npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && npm run release:changelog && npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && npm run release:changelog && npm version major && npm run release

author: Thomas Kottke <t.kottke90@gmail.com>
